mapper.insert: /* collab.task.addTaskMap */ INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.collab_task_map (prjSeq, prjType, taskSeq ,sectionSeq ,RegisterCode,RegisteDate) VALUES (#{prjSeq}, #{prjType}, #{taskSeq},#{sectionSeq},#{USERID},now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE RegisterCode = #{USERID} ,RegisteDate = NOW()
mapper.select: /* collab.task.getTask */ SELECT t.* , Fn_GetBaseCodeName('0', 'CollabStatus', t.TaskStatus) TaskStatusName , IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM covi_smart4j.collab_task_favorite f WHERE t.taskseq = f.taskSeq AND UserCode = #{USERID}),0) IsFav , IFNULL((SELECT SectionSeq FROM covi_smart4j.collab_task_map m WHERE t.taskseq = m.taskSeq AND prjSeq = #{prjSeq} AND prjType = #{prjType}),0) SectionSeq , case when (t.EndDate is null OR STR_TO_DATE(t.EndDate,'%Y%m%d') < NOW()) AND t.TaskStatus NOT IN ('C','H') then 'Y' end AS IsDelay , par.TaskSeq ParTaskSeq , par.TaskName ParTaskName , par.TaskStatus ParTaskStatus FROM covi_smart4j.collab_task t LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.collab_task par on par.taskseq= t.parentKey WHERE t.taskSeq = #{taskSeq}

/* collab.task.getSubTask */ SELECT t.* ,(SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) FROM collab_task WHERE ParentKey = t.TaskSeq AND ParentKey > 0) AS PCnt ,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(ctm.UserCode,'^',covi_smart4j.Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang},sou.MultiDisplayName),'^',sou.PhotoPath,'^',bg.DeptName) SEPARATOR '|') FROM covi_smart4j.collab_task_member ctm JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user sou on ctm.userCode = sou.userCode JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup bg ON bg.UserCode = sou.UserCode AND bg.JobType = 'Origin' WHERE ctm.taskSeq = t.TaskSeq) tmUser FROM covi_smart4j.collab_task t WHERE parentKey = #{taskSeq}
mapper.delete: /* collab.task.deleteTask */ DELETE FROM collab_task WHERE taskSeq = #{taskSeq}

/* collab.task.deleteSubTask */ DELETE FROM collab_task WHERE taskseq IN ( with recursive cte (taskSeq, taskName, parentKey) as ( select taskSeq, taskName, parentKey from collab_task where parentKey = #{taskSeq} union all select r.taskSeq, r.taskName, r.parentKey from collab_task r inner join cte on r.parentKey = cte.taskSeq ) SELECT taskSeq from cte)
mapper.select: /* collab.task.getTaskMap */ SELECT case when tm.PrjType = 'P' then cp.PrjName ELSE Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, MultiDisplayName) END PrjName, cs.SectionSeq , cs.SectionName, tm.PrjSeq, tm.PrjType, cp.PrjColor FROM covi_smart4j.collab_task_map tm LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.collab_project cp ON tm.PrjType = 'P' AND cp.PrjSeq = tm.PrjSeq LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_group sb ON tm.PrjType != 'P' AND tm.PrjSeq = sb.GroupID LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.collab_section cs ON tm.PrjSeq = cs.PrjSeq and tm.PrjType = cs.PrjType AND tm.SectionSeq = cs.SectionSeq WHERE tm.taskSeq = #{taskSeq}

/* collab.task.getTaskLink */ SELECT 'AF' LinkType, af.LinkTaskSeq, t.TaskName, t.TaskStatus , Fn_GetBaseCodeName('0', 'CollabStatus', t.TaskStatus) TaskStatusName , (SELECT TaskName FROM covi_smart4j.collab_task WHERE TaskSeq = af.LinkTaskSeq) AS LinkTaskName FROM covi_smart4j.collab_task_link aF JOIN covi_smart4j.collab_task t ON af.LinkTaskSeq = t.TaskSeq WHERE af.taskSeq = #{taskSeq} UNION SELECT 'BF' LinkType, bf.TaskSeq, t.TaskName, t.TaskStatus , Fn_GetBaseCodeName('0', 'CollabStatus', t.TaskStatus) TaskStatusName , (SELECT TaskName FROM covi_smart4j.collab_task WHERE TaskSeq = bf.TaskSeq) AS LinkTaskName FROM covi_smart4j.collab_task_link bf JOIN covi_smart4j.collab_task t ON bf.taskSeq = t.TaskSeq WHERE bf.linktaskseq = #{taskSeq}

mapper.select: /* collab.task.getTaskMember */ SELECT cpm.UserCode ,covi_smart4j.Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang},soub.MultiDeptName) DeptName ,covi_smart4j.Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang},soub.MultiJobPositionName) JobPositionName ,covi_smart4j.Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang},sou.MultiDisplayName) DisplayName ,sou.PhotoPath FROM covi_smart4j.collab_task_member cpm JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user sou on cpm.userCode = sou.userCode JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup soub ON sou.UserCode = soub.UserCode AND soub.JobType ='Origin' WHERE cpm.taskSeq = #{taskSeq}

/* collab.task.addTaskLink */ INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.collab_task_link (taskSeq ,linkTaskSeq ,RegisterCode,RegisteDate) VALUES (#{taskSeq},#{linkTaskSeq},#{USERID},now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE RegisterCode = #{USERID} ,RegisteDate = NOW()
mapper.select: /* collab.task.getTaskMapBySchedule */ SELECT A.taskSeq , B.prjSeq , B.prjType , B.sectionSeq , IFNULL(E.PrjName, covi_smart4j.Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, F.MultiDisplayName)) AS prjName , IFNULL(D.SectionName, '') AS sectionName FROM covi_smart4j.collab_task A INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.collab_task_map B ON B.TaskSeq = A.TaskSeq INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.event_date C ON C.EventID = A.ObjectID AND REPLACE(C.StartDate, '-', '') = A.StartDate AND REPLACE(C.EndDate, '-', '') = A.EndDate AND C.DateID = #{dateID} LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.collab_section D ON D.SectionSeq = B.SectionSeq LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.collab_project E ON E.PrjSeq = B.PrjSeq AND B.PrjType = 'P' LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_group F ON F.GroupID = B.PrjSeq AND B.PrjType = 'T' WHERE 1=1 AND A.ObjectID = #{eventID} AND A.ObjectType = 'EVENT'

/* collab.task.selectTaskMemberList */ WITH PROJECT_SEQ AS( SELECT PrjSeq FROM covi_smart4j.collab_task_map WHERE TaskSeq = #{taskSeq} ) ,TEAM_MEMBER AS( SELECT soub.UserCode ,covi_smart4j.Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang},soub.MultiDeptName) DeptName ,covi_smart4j.Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang},soub.MultiJobPositionName) JobPositionName ,covi_smart4j.Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang},sou.MultiDisplayName) DisplayName ,sou.PhotoPath FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_group sb JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup soub ON sb.GroupCode = soub.DeptCode JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user sou on sou.UserCode = soub.UserCode #AND soub.JobType ='Origin' WHERE sb.GroupId IN ( SELECT PrjSeq FROM PROJECT_SEQ ) ) ,PROJECT_MEMBER AS( SELECT cpm.UserCode ,covi_smart4j.Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang},soub.MultiDeptName) DeptName ,covi_smart4j.Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang},soub.MultiJobPositionName) JobPositionName ,covi_smart4j.Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang},sou.MultiDisplayName) DisplayName ,sou.PhotoPath FROM covi_smart4j.collab_project_member cpm JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user sou on cpm.userCode = sou.userCode JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup soub ON sou.UserCode = soub.UserCode AND soub.JobType ='Origin' WHERE cpm.prjSeq IN ( SELECT PrjSeq FROM PROJECT_SEQ ) ) SELECT DAT.UserCode ,DAT.DeptName ,DAT.JobPositionName ,DAT.DisplayName ,DAT.PhotoPath FROM ( SELECT * FROM TEAM_MEMBER UNION ALL SELECT * FROM PROJECT_MEMBER ) DAT GROUP BY DAT.UserCode,DAT.DeptName,DAT.JobPositionName,DAT.DisplayName,DAT.PhotoPath
mapper.delete: /* collab.task.deleteTaskBySchedule */ DELETE A FROM covi_smart4j.event_date A INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.collab_task B ON B.TaskSeq = #{taskSeq} AND A.EventID = B.ObjectID WHERE 1=1 AND A.EventID = #{EventID} AND REPLACE(A.StartDate, '-', '') = B.StartDate AND REPLACE(A.EndDate, '-', '') = B.EndDate
mapper.select: SELECT 'MEM', pm.UserCode FROM collab_task_map tm JOIN collab_project_manager pm ON pm.PrjSeq = tm.PrjSeq WHERE tm.taskSeq = #{taskSeq} AND tm.PrjType = 'P' union SELECT 'MAN', pm.UserCode FROM collab_task_map tm JOIN collab_project_member pm ON pm.PrjSeq = tm.PrjSeq WHERE tm.taskSeq = #{taskSeq} AND tm.PrjType = 'P' union SELECT 'VIE', pm.UserCode FROM collab_task_map tm JOIN collab_project_viewer pm ON pm.PrjSeq = tm.PrjSeq WHERE tm.taskSeq = #{taskSeq} AND tm.PrjType = 'P' union SELECT 'TEAM', soub.UserCode FROM collab_task_map tm JOIN sys_object_group o ON o.GroupId = tm.PrjSeq JOIN sys_object_user_basegroup soub ON o.GroupCode = soub.DeptCode WHERE tm.taskSeq = #{taskSeq} AND tm.PrjType != 'P' union SELECT 'SUM', t.UserCode FROM COLLAB_TASK_MEMBER T WHERE taskSeq = #{taskSeq}
